titles.section1: - Lost Pet Reunions, One Click Away
titles.section3: Find your furry friend with PawClix.

descriptions.section1: Our app utilizes advanced technology to facilitate the reunification of lost pets with their owners. We provide a platform for posting lost pet listings and actively work to connect owners with individuals who have found them.
descriptions.section2: Additionally, our app connects you with a wide range of pet-related services, including veterinary clinics, groomers, trainers, and more. We ensure that you have access to the right resources for your pet's specific needs.
descriptions.section3: Our mobile-friendly app uses the latest technologies to provide a safe and secure platform for reuniting lost pets with their owners.
descriptions.section4: Our app provides valuable information on pet health and emergency care, including the importance of vaccinations and regular check-ups to ensure your pet stays healthy and happy.
descriptions.section5: Receive immediate alerts when a lost or found pet is reported in your vicinity. Be the first to help reunite furry friends with their owners.
descriptions.section6: A section that provides tips and resources for pet owners on how to prevent their pets from getting lost, as well as what to do if their pet goes missing.
descriptions.section7: A feature that allows users to create a profile for their lost pet, including a photo, description, and contact information.
descriptions.section8: Integration with social media platforms to help spread the word about lost pets and facilitate communication among users.
descriptions.section9: A searchable database of lost and found pets, which allows users to search for pets based on location, breed, color, and other characteristics.
descriptions.section10: A feature that displays a map of lost and found pets in the area, allowing users to easily locate and identify lost pets.
descriptions.section11: A feature that allows users to easily create and print lost pet flyers to distribute in their local community.
descriptions.section12: Your contribution can help us continue our mission to reunite lost pets with their families and provide them with the care they need. Every little bit counts and we appreciate your support!
descriptions.section13: Your feedback is incredibly valuable to us as we strive to improve our app and provide the best possible service to pet owners. We appreciate any comments, suggestions, or criticisms you may have, and we will use them to make our app even better. Please take a moment to share your thoughts with us.
descriptions.section14: Our sponsors play a crucial role in helping us continue our mission to reunite lost pets with their families and provide them with the care they need. Their generous support not only helps us keep the lights on, but also makes a real difference in the lives of lost and abandoned animals.

descriptions.section1: We are grateful for any support or sponsorship that can help us unlock the full potential of our web application. If you share our vision and would like to contribute towards the cost of utilizing premium tiers and services, please reach out to us. Your support will enable us to enhance our app and provide an even better experience for our users.
descriptions.section2: We appreciate any help or collaboration from developers who share our passion for building amazing web applications. If you're interested in contributing, please don't hesitate to reach out. Together, we can create something incredible!
descriptions.section3: Express.js is a popular Node.js web application framework that provides a fast and minimalist approach to building web applications. It simplifies the development of server-side applications and APIs with its robust features and modular architecture.
descriptions.section4: TomTom Maps offers powerful geolocation and mapping services that enable you to integrate interactive maps, geocoding, routing, and geospatial analysis into your web applications. It provides accurate and up-to-date map data and a comprehensive set of APIs for location-based services.
descriptions.section5: Node.js is a server-side JavaScript runtime environment that allows you to build scalable and efficient web applications. It uses an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model, making it ideal for developing real-time applications, microservices, and APIs.
descriptions.section6: MongoDB is a flexible and scalable NoSQL database that provides high performance, high availability, and horizontal scalability. It offers a document-oriented data model, allowing you to store, retrieve, and manipulate data easily, making it well-suited for modern web applications.
descriptions.section7: Cloudinary is a comprehensive media management and delivery platform that simplifies the process of storing, optimizing, and delivering images and videos for web applications. It provides powerful APIs and tools for image and video manipulation, transformation, and optimization.
descriptions.section8: EJS is a popular templating engine that allows you to generate dynamic HTML pages by embedding JavaScript code within your templates. It provides a simple and intuitive syntax for data interpolation, conditionals, loops, and partials, making it easy to create reusable and maintainable views for your web applications.
descriptions.section9: Bootstrap is a widely-used responsive CSS framework that provides a collection of pre-built components and styles to help you quickly and efficiently create modern, mobile-friendly web interfaces. With Bootstrap, you can easily customize and arrange components to create visually appealing and consistent layouts for your web projects.
descriptions.section10: Cyclic is a serverless cloud hosting platform designed to streamline your app deployment process. Enjoy instant app availability, efficient resource allocation, and seamless scalability. Benefit from cloud-scale database and storage options, global app deployment for reduced latency, and the flexibility to customize and integrate your apps. Simplify your deployment workflow with built-in CI/CD integration and GitHub support.

links.section1: Express.js - Fast and Minimalist Web Application Framework
links.section2: TomTom Maps - Powerful Geolocation and Mapping Services
links.section3: Node.js - Scalable and Efficient JavaScript Runtime
links.section4: MongoDB - Flexible and Scalable NoSQL Database
links.section5: Cloudinary - Media Management and Delivery Platform

home.welcomeText: Find your furry friend with PawClix.

about.ourGoalText1: Our app utilizes advanced technology to facilitate the reunification of lost pets with their owners. We provide a platform for posting lost pet listings and actively work to connect owners with individuals who have found them.
about.ourGoalText2: Additionally, our app connects you with a wide range of pet-related services, including veterinary clinics, groomers, trainers, and more. We ensure that you have access to the right resources for your pet's specific needs.
about.featureText1: Our mobile-friendly app uses the latest technologies to provide a safe and secure platform for reuniting lost pets with their owners.
about.featureText2: Our app provides valuable information on pet health and emergency care, including the importance of vaccinations and regular check-ups to ensure your pet stays healthy and happy.
about.featureText3: A section that provides information on local animal shelters, veterinarians, and other resources for pet owners.
about.featureText4: A section that provides tips and resources for pet owners on how to prevent their pets from getting lost, as well as what to do if their pet goes missing.
about.featureText5: A feature that allows users to create a profile for their lost pet, including a photo, description, and contact information.
about.featureText6: Integration with social media platforms to help spread the word about lost pets and facilitate communication among users.
about.featureText7: A searchable database of lost and found pets, which allows users to search for pets based on location, breed, color, and other characteristics.
about.featureText8: A feature that displays a map of lost and found pets in the area, allowing users to easily locate and identify lost pets.
about.featureText9: A feature that allows users to easily create and print lost pet flyers to distribute in their local community.
about.supportOurProjectText: Your contribution can help us continue our mission to reunite lost pets with their families and provide them with the care they need. Every little bit counts and we appreciate your support!
about.shareYourThoughtsText: Your feedback is incredibly valuable to us as we strive to improve our app and provide the best possible service to pet owners. We appreciate any comments, suggestions, or criticisms you may have, and we will use them to make our app even better. Please take a moment to share your thoughts with us.
about.sponsorsText: Our sponsors play a crucial role in helping us continue our mission to reunite lost pets with their families and provide them with the care they need. Their generous support not only helps us keep the lights on, but also makes a real difference in the lives of lost and abandoned animals.

description.note: NOTE: this will be made public, please do not provide sensitive information that you would like kept private
description.pleaseProvideLocation: Please provide your approximate location or nearest city

animal-shelters.title: Animal Shelters
animal-shelters.description: Dedicated shelters that provide temporary homes and care for abandoned or stray animals until they can be adopted.

cat-cafe.title: Cat Cafe
cat-cafe.description: Cafes or establishments where customers can enjoy a beverage and interact with resident cats in a relaxed environment.

dog-walking.title: Dog Walking
dog-walking.description: Professional dog walkers who provide exercise and companionship for dogs during regular walks.

pet-art.title: Pet Art
pet-art.description: Artists or businesses that create customized portraits and crafts inspired by pets.

pet-boarding.title: Pet Boarding
pet-boarding.description: Facilities or services that offer temporary boarding and care for pets when their owners are away.

pet-burial-services.title: Pet Burial Services
pet-burial-services.description: Services that offer respectful and compassionate handling of pet burials and cremations.

pet-expo.title: Pet Expo
pet-expo.description: Exhibitions and events dedicated to showcasing various pet-related products, services, and activities.

pet-friendly-accommodation.title: Pet Friendly Accommodation
pet-friendly-accommodation.description: Hotels, vacation rentals, or accommodations that welcome pets and provide suitable amenities and services for them.

pet-friendly-restaurants.title: Pet Friendly Restaurants
pet-friendly-restaurants.description: Enjoy dining with your pets at these welcoming establishments.

pet-grooming.title: Pet Grooming
pet-grooming.description: Services that offer grooming, bathing, and styling for pets to keep them clean and well-groomed.

pet-photography.title: Pet Photography
pet-photography.description: Professional photographers specializing in capturing beautiful and memorable images of pets.

pet-breeders.title: Pet Breeders
pet-breeders.description: Professional breeders who selectively breed and raise specific breeds or types of pets.

pet-search.title: Pet Search
pet-search.description: Organizations or services dedicated to locating lost or missing pets.

pet-sitting.title: Pet Sitting
pet-sitting.description: Professional pet sitters who offer in-home care and companionship for pets when their owners are away.

pet-supplies.title: Pet Supplies
pet-supplies.description: Stores or services that provide a wide range of pet supplies, including food, toys, and accessories.

pet-training.title: Pet Training
pet-training.description: Training programs and services to help pets develop good behavior, obedience, and social skills.

pet-transportation.title: Pet Transportation
pet-transportation.description: Specialized transportation services for pets, including pet taxi, relocation, and safe travel arrangements.

veterinary-services.title: Veterinary Services
veterinary-services.description: Medical care, health services, and treatments provided by licensed veterinarians for pets.

pet-insurance.title: Pet Insurance
pet-insurance.description: Insurance coverage for pets to help with medical expenses and emergencies.

legal-services.title: Legal Services
legal-services.description: Legal assistance related to pet ownership, contracts, and disputes.
